original_text: Abimelech was told that all the leaders of the Tower of Shechem were gathered together.
korean_text: 세겜 망대의 모든 사람들이 모인 것이 아비멜렉에게 알려지매

sentences.original_text: that all the leaders of the Tower of Shechem were gathered together.
sentences.korean_translation: 세겜 성 망대의 모든 지도자들이 함께 모여 있었다.
